page.title: 05Living in a rural area
page.content: Living in a rural area is a big problem, as the main shops are in Braunton and Barnstaple. It's more expensive because to get to a supermarket is about 5 miles away. To get to good big shops you have to go to Barnstaple or even Exeter.The shops in Croyde and Georgeham are more expensive. Most people wouldn't prefer to live in the city.Some advantages are the beaches and the countryside. Most people I asked that didn't drive a car did most of their shopping in the area.But people who drove a car did most of their shopping out of the area.We also have to travel about 3 miles to school. I asked people whether they had most of their relatives living in the area.Most people said no they didn't have relatives in the area.
